Package game

Class Human

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.ZombieActor
game.Human
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActorInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Doctor, Farmer, Player
public class Human
extends ZombieActor
Class representing an ordinary human. This Human can attack Zombie, eat food, pick up item and wander around.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class game.ZombieActor

    rand

  • Constructor Details

    • Human

      public Human​(java.lang.String name)
      The default constructor creates default Humans
      Parameters:
      name - the human's display name

    • Human

      protected Human​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints)
      The protected constructor can be used to create subtypes of Human, such as the Player
      Parameters:
      name - the human's display name
      displayChar - character that will represent the Human in the map
      hitPoints - amount of damage that the Human can take before it dies

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
      If there is Zombie around Human, he will attack. If not, he will eat food if he lost some hit points and there is some foods in his inventory. Otherwise, if there is an item on the location Human is standing on, he will pick up. Else, Human will wander around.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      Human's action for current turn.

    • isConscious

      public boolean isConscious()
      Returns true if the Human has positive hit points. Change the capability of Human if he is dead.
      Overrides:
      isConscious in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      Returns:
      true if and only if hitPoints is positive.
